QuestData.Title: Travel to Moa'ki Harbor
QuestData.Description: $R, word just arrived from Moa'ki Harbor. Something very bad happened over there this morning!$B$BYou've been very helpful to us here. Would you consider using the boat from Unu'pe to travel to the great Dragonblight?$B$BBy the sound of things, Elder Ko'nani could certainly use your assistance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Moa'ki Harbor in the Dragonblight and speak with Elder Ko'nani.
QuestData.RewardText: What's that you say, $r? Hotawa sent you?$B$BGood, good... there's much to do. We can use all of the help that we can get!
